item.title: American Dream Awards Breakfast
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Join us for our signature annual event, the American Dream Awards Breakfast which raises critical funds to help Habitat families achieve their dream of homeownership. Network with top real estate industry professionals and enjoy an inspirational morning with Habitat for Humanity.
item.content:encoded:
Join us for an inspirational morning at Habitat Greater Boston’s signature annual event, the American Dream Awards Breakfast. Honor individuals who contribute to the improvement of the Greater Boston community and hear from Habitat families who have achieved the dream of homeownership because of your support.

Funds raised at the breakfast will be used to build homes and create affordable homeownership opportunities for low-income families in the Greater Boston area.

Network with leaders in Boston’s real estate industry. Meet partner families, dedicated volunteers, and other supporters. And learn more about our mission to build strength, stability, and self-reliance through shelter in the Greater Boston area.

Become a Sponsor
For information about sponsorship opportunities, please contact
Theresa Lakin, Director of External Relations, at (617) 423-2223 ext 24 or theresalakin@habitatboston.org.
(Link to Event Sponsorship sub-page)

item.title: Event Sponsorship
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: An event sponsorship offers a unique opportunity to contribute to Habitat for Humanity and support Habitat families. Read more about our sponsorship levels and benefits!
item.content:encoded:
Make the dream of homeownership a reality for low-income families…
Become an American Dream Awards Breakfast Sponsor!

For more information about sponsorship opportunities, please contact
Theresa Lakin, Director of External Relations, at (617) 423-2223 ext 24 or theresalakin@habitatboston.org.

LEAD SPONSOR $50,000
Please contact us for full lead sponsor details

TITANIUM DEVELOPER $25,000
Two tables (20 seats—preferred seating)
Two seats at the head table
Full-page ad in event program
Event signage and recognition

PLATINUM BUILDER $10,000
One table (10 seats—preferred seating)
One seat at the head table
Full-page ad in event program
Event signage and recognition

GOLDEN LADDER $5,000
One table (10 seats)
Half-page ad in event program
Event signage and recognition

SILVER SAW $3,500
One table (10 seats)
Quarter-page ad in event program
Event signage and recognition

COMMUNITY LEADER $1,000
Four tickets
Event program recognition

FRIEND $500
Two tickets
Event program recognition

item.title: Third Party Events
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: A benefit event or personal fundraising campaign is a great way to support Habitat.
item.content:encoded:
From golf tournaments and road races to donations in lieu of wedding gifts and birthday presents, there’s no limit to how you can raise money to support Habitat Greater Boston. No event is too big or too small. And every dollar counts!

Here are some upcoming events organized by people like you. All proceeds benefit Habitat’s mission of breaking the cycle of poverty through home ownership.

For more information about having a fundraiser for Habitat, please contact Theresa Lakin, Director of External Relations, at (617) 423-2223 ext 24 or theresalakin [at] habitatboston [dot] org.
